contextId.occurrenceNote: Here the word "was" is understood. Alternate translation: "Isaac was the father ... Jacob was the father" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: Isaac the father ... Jacob the father

contextId.occurrenceNote: Here the word "was" is understood. Alternate translation: "Perez was the father ... Hezron was the father" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: Perez the father ... Hezron the father

contextId.occurrenceNote: Here the word "was" is understood. Alternate translation: "Amminadab was the father ... Nahshon was the father" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: Amminadab the father ... Nahshon the father

contextId.occurrenceNote: Here the word "was" is understood. Alternate translation: "Boaz was the father ... Obed was the father" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: Boaz the father ... Obed the father

contextId.occurrenceNote: Here the word "was" is understood. "David was the father of Solomon, and Solomon's mother was Uriah's wife" or "David and the wife of Uriah were the parents of Solomon" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: David the father of Solomon by the wife of Uriah

contextId.occurrenceNote: The word "was" is understood in both of these phrases. Alternate translation: "Rehoboam was the father of Abijah, and Abijah was the father of Asa" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.quote: τὸν Ῥοβοάμ, Ῥοβοὰμ ... ἐγέννησεν τὸν Ἀβιά, Ἀβιὰ ... ἐγέννησεν τὸν Ἀσάφ
contextId.glQuote: Rehoboam the father of Abijah, Abijah the father of Asa

contextId.occurrenceNote: The phrase "need a physician" is understood. Alternate translation: "people who are sick need a physician" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: those who are sick

contextId.occurrenceNote: The full content of their answer is not stated, but it is understood. Alternate translation: "Yes, Lord, we believe you can heal us" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: Yes, Lord

contextId.occurrenceNote: Jesus did not state what the disciples had received or were to give. Some languages may require this information in the sentence. Here "freely" means that there was no payment. Alternate translation: "Freely you have received these things, freely give them to others" or "You received these things without paying, so give them to others without making them pay" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: Freely you have received, freely give

contextId.occurrenceNote: These words can be translated as a complete sentence. Alternate translation: "fathers will deliver up their children to death" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: a father his child

contextId.occurrenceNote: You can make explicit the information that is understood. Alternate translation: "I will also acknowledge before my Father who is in heaven that that person belongs to me" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.quote: ὁμολογήσω κἀγὼ ... ἔμπροσθεν τοῦ Πατρός μου τοῦ ἐν οὐρανοῖς
contextId.glQuote: I will also confess before my Father who is in heaven

contextId.occurrenceNote: You can make explicit the information that is understood. Alternate translation: "I will deny before my Father who is in heaven that this person belongs to me" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.quote: ἀρνήσομαι κἀγὼ ... ἔμπροσθεν τοῦ Πατρός μου τοῦ ἐν οὐρανοῖς
contextId.glQuote: I will also deny before my Father who is in heaven

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be translated as a complete sentence. Alternate translation: "he is not an ordinary prophet" or "he is more important than a normal prophet" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: much more than a prophet

contextId.occurrenceNote: The details of the message the person told Jesus are understood and not repeated here. Alternate translation: "who told Jesus that his mother and brothers wanted to speak to him" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: who told him

contextId.occurrenceNote: The words "seeds," "produced," and "crop" are understood from the previous phrase. These can be expressed clearly. Alternate translation: "some seeds produced one hundred times as much crop, some seeds produced sixty times as much crop, and some seeds produced thirty times as much crop" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: some one hundred times as much, some sixty, and some thirty

contextId.occurrenceNote: The phrase "as much as was planted" is understood following each of these numbers. See how you translated this in [Matthew 13:8](../13/08.md). Alternate translation: "Some people produce 100 times as much as was planted, some produce 60 times as much, and some produce 30 times as much" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]] and [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-numbers]])
contextId.glQuote: yielding one hundred times as much as was planted, some sixty, and some thirty times as much

contextId.occurrenceNote: The understood information can be made clear. Alternate translation: "Seven loaves of bread, and a few small fish" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: Seven, and a few small fish

contextId.occurrenceNote: You can make clear the understood information. Alternate translation: "the other side of the lake" or "the other side of the Sea of Galilee" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: the other side

contextId.occurrenceNote: The understood information can be made clear. Alternate translation: "but it was my Father in heaven who revealed this to you" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: but my Father who is in heaven

contextId.occurrenceNote: You can make clear the understood information. Alternate translation: "marries another woman" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: marries another

contextId.occurrenceNote: You can make clear the understood information. Alternate translation: "but to serve other people" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: but to serve

contextId.occurrenceNote: You can make clear the understood information. Alternate translation: "for many people" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: for many

contextId.occurrenceNote: You can make clear the understood information in their response. Alternate translation: "The coin has Caesar's image and name on it" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: Caesar's

contextId.occurrenceNote: The understood information can be made clear. Alternate translation: "And you also say" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: And

contextId.occurrenceNote: The understood information can be stated clearly. Alternate translation: "to buy more oil" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: to buy

contextId.occurrenceNote: The word "talents" is understood from the previous phrase. Alternate translation: "to another he gave two talents of gold ... gave one talent of gold" or "to another he gave two bags of gold ... gave one bag of gold" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: to another he gave two ... gave one talent

contextId.occurrenceNote: The understood information can be stated clearly. Alternate translation: "received back my own money" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: received back my own

contextId.occurrenceNote: The understood information can be stated clearly. Alternate translation: "Or when did we see you thirsty" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: Or thirsty

contextId.occurrenceNote: This is the end of a series of questions that begins in verse 37. The understood information can be stated clearly. Alternate translation: "Or when did we see you naked" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: Or naked

contextId.occurrenceNote: The words "I was" preceding "naked" are understood. Alternate translation: "I was naked, but you did not give me clothes" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: naked, but you did not clothe me

contextId.occurrenceNote: The words "I was" preceding "sick" are understood. Alternate translation: "I was sick and in prison" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: sick and in prison

contextId.occurrenceNote: The understood information can be made clear. Alternate translation: "but the King will send the righteous to the place where they will live forever with God" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: but the righteous into eternal life

contextId.occurrenceNote: What the leaders did not want to do during the feast can be made clearer. Alternate translation: "We should not kill Jesus during the feast" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: Not during the feast

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be expressed as a full sentence. Alternate translation: "But do not do what I want; instead, do what you want" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: Yet, not as I will, but as you will

contextId.occurrenceNote: The understood information can be stated clearly. Alternate translation: "and if they deceive people by saying that, it will be worse than the way he deceived people before when he said that he was the Christ" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-ellipsis]])
contextId.glQuote: and the last deception will be worse than the first
